#### 文字列入力

```py
import PySimpleGUI as sg

value = sg.popup_get_text(
    'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.',
    title = 'Lorem Ipsum',
    default_text = 'Donec nec est dui. Proin ut aliquet eros.',
    # password_char = '',
    # icon = 'path or base64 of window icon'
    # font = 'Helvetica',
    # no_titlebar = True,
    # grab_anywhere = True,
    # keep_on_top = True,
    # location = (x, y),
    # image = 'path or base64 of image',
    # modal = True
)
print(value) # Donec nec est dui. Proin ut aliquet eros.
```
